markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Draw](/Feats.aspx?ID=4869) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80) (Level 4), [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91) (Level 4), [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) (Level 4), [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247) (Level 4), [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=267) (Level 4), [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271) (Level 4), [Eagle Knight](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=314) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion. You Interact to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon.
name: Quick Draw

summary_markdown: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Quick Draw Single Action Source Player Core pg. 159 2.0 Archetypes Vigilante (Level 4), Butterfly Blade (Level 4), Alkenstar Agent (Level 4), Dual-Weapon Warrior (Level 4), Vigilante (Level 4), Red Mantis Assassin (Level 4), Eagle Knight (Level 4) --- You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion. You Interact to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon.
